quote_first: There must be a solution, there must be. Frantically I scan the cans of products stacked on the shelves. Stain Away. Vanish. There has to be a remedy. … I just need to think. …
quote_last: OK, I have the answer. It may not totally work—but it’s my best shot.
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_first:
“At what time will it be ready?” asked Mr. Codlin faintly.
“It’ll be done to a turn,” said the landlord looking up to the clock – and the very clock had a colour in its fat white face, and looked a clock for Jolly Sandboys to consult – “it’ll be done to a turn at
title: The Old Curiosity Shop
author: Charles Dickens
